gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 122, Knicks 108
gameRecap.excerpt: Led by Luka Doncic's 39 points (7-14 3pt FG), eight rebounds and 11 assists, the Mavericks defeated the Knicks, 122-108. Tim Hardaway Jr. (19 points, five 3PM) and Kyrie Irving (16 points, six assists) added a combined 35 points for the Mavericks in the victory, while Josh Hart tallied his second triple-double of the season with 23 points, 10 rebounds and 12 assists for the Knicks in the losing effort. The Mavericks win their third straight game as they improve to 29-23 on the season, while the Knicks fall to 33-19.
